meanings.definition: To be excessively enthusiastic or fervent in pursuit of a cause or objective.
meanings.sent1: She overzeals her support for the charity by volunteering every weekend.
meanings.sent2: He always overzeals when it comes to discussing his favorite sports team.
meanings.sent3: The puppy overzeals its tail, thinking it's a toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: Her excitement overzeals like a bursting balloon, filling the room with energy.
meanings.sent5: The children's laughter overzeals as they play in the park.

meanings.definition: Showing excessive enthusiasm or fervor in pursuit of a cause or objective.
meanings.sent1: The overzeals fans cheered loudly at the concert.
meanings.sent2: She received an award for her overzeals dedication to the project.
meanings.sent3: The overzeals decorations at the party made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: His overzeals attitude brightened up the gloomy office.
meanings.sent5: The overzeals colors of the painting caught everyone's attention.
